long_description: Made for the BOB Motion stroller, this Sun Shield cover helps reduce exposure to harmful ultraviolet rays (UVA and UVB) and also protects children from wind and flying insects. Main front panel is constructed of protective mesh that allows children to see out and parents to see in. The rest of the Sun Shield cover is constructed out of sturdy nylon for lasting use. Elastic attachment is simple and easy. Fits BOB Motion stroller (sold separately).
short_description: Made for the BOB Motion stroller, this Sun Shield cover helps reduce exposure to harmful ultraviolet rays (UVA and UVB) and also protects children from wind and flying insects.
